meanings.definition: The study or tracing of lines of descent.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother enjoys researching our family genealogies.
meanings.sent2: The genealogies of the royal family are well-documented.
meanings.sent3: The genealogies at the family reunion caused some surprising discoveries.
meanings.sent4: In the genealogies of music, we can trace the evolution of different genres.
meanings.sent5: Learning about genealogies helps us understand our roots and history better.

meanings.definition: A record or table of the descent of a person, family, or group from an ancestor or ancestors.
meanings.sent1: She found an old genealogies book that detailed her family history.
meanings.sent2: The genealogies show how our family has grown over the years.
meanings.sent3: The genealogies revealed a long-lost relative no one knew about.
meanings.sent4: The genealogies of the ancient tribe were inscribed on stone tablets.
meanings.sent5: Studying genealogies can provide a sense of connection to our past.
